#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main(){
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        int x,y;
        cin >> x >> y;
        if(x > y){
            cout << "Bipin " << x-y << endl;
        }else if(y > x){
            cout << "Balaji " << y-x << endl;
        }else{
            cout << "No Winner" << endl;
        }
    }
}
